mapper.select: select * FROM member where mId = #{mId} AND mPasswd = #{mPasswd}
select mId, mPasswd, mRole, mName, mNum from member where mId = #{mId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( mId, mPasswd, mName, mGender, mTel, mBirth, mCreateTime, mRole ) VALUES ( #{mId}, #{mPasswd}, #{mName}, #{mGender}, #{mTel}, #{mBirth}, NOW(), #{mRole} )
INSERT INTO member ( mId, mName, mCreateTime, mRole, socialType, socialId ) VALUES ( #{mId}, #{mName}, NOW(), #{mRole}, #{socialType}, #{socialId} )
